original_title: Peña: Finding the Black Rhythms of Peru
overview: In April of 2010, Secret Stash Records traveled to Lima, Peru, to record Afro Peruvian music. With a portable recording studio, an interpreter, and no pre-planned engagements or sessions they hit the streets.  This self titled release highlights the best recordings from those sessions.
title: Peña: Finding the Black Rhythms of Peru
